title: Venus Transit in the 6th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Venus transiting the sixth house refines daily routines, work relationships, and health awareness. For Cancer ascendants, this phase brings harmony into service-oriented roles and improves cooperation with colleagues through tact and empathy. Conflicts can soften when approached diplomatically. Attention to wellness, diet, and balanced habits increases, though comfort-seeking can interfere with discipline. This transit favors graceful problem-solving, pleasant work environments, and consistent self-care, helping turn obligations into manageable rhythms without sacrificing emotional balance.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Desire for harmony in daily life

sections.heading: Career
points: Support in service or support roles

closing:
This transit brings grace into effort and service.
Use Venus to balance duty with care and tact.
Consistent harmony sustains daily well-being.
